title: FOR SALE T206 Mordecai Brown and Joe Kelley ***SOLD***
author: iggyman

posts.post_title: FOR SALE T206 Mordecai Brown and Joe Kelley ***SOLD***
posts.post_content:
I have a T206 Brown portrait ($72...SOLD!) and T206 Joe Kelley ($25...SOLD!) for sale.  Prices include delivery.  Check, money order, or paypal all work for me. Thanks for looking! My email is [url]agonzdude@yahoo.com[/url]. 

Here are the pics:


Some edge wear on the right side, three faint creases in the upper part of card, otherwise nice eye appeal and actually looks nicer then the pic.........$72
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=44924&d=1314651196[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=44925&d=1314651205[/IMG]


This one was once in a scrapbook.  Thus, respectable eye appeal on the front, alot of damage on the back side.....$25
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=44926&d=1314651219[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=44927&d=1314651229[/IMG]

Lovely Day...

Iggy,

I'll take the Brown.

Mike
